name: Throwing Love
description:
Help this girl with her premier love, bring him to the end of the levels, but be carefull with your love bar ! Try to beat the game with 2000+ love at the end of the levels.

Cool features :

  • Throw your sweetheart to smash blocks
  • Super bouncing balls
  • A lovely love bar
  • Now with lives !
  • And a totally new world !

(Originaly made for the #LoveJam in 48 hours, this is the new version)
